handoff.one_sentence_goal: Verify and refine a landing page spec
handoff.problem_statement: Need an execution-ready implementation brief with explicit scope and acceptance criteria.
objective: Deliver an MVP implementation plan with no ambiguity
Define acceptance criteria that can be validated quickly
scope_out: Backend architecture changes unless explicitly requested
functional_requirements: Use goal as primary deliverable: Verify and refine a landing page spec
Incorporate context: Target: startup web team
Enforce constraints: No backend, one page
acceptance_criteria: Output can be pasted directly into the target tool
handoff.build_prompt:
Build this exactly as specified.

Target tool: Lovable
Goal: Verify and refine a landing page spec
Context: Target: startup web team
Constraints: No backend, one page

Do NOT implement anything outside the requested MVP scope.
Return changed files and validation results.
handoff.lovable_build_prompt:
Build this exactly as specified.

Target tool: Lovable
Goal: Verify and refine a landing page spec
Context: Target: startup web team
Constraints: No backend, one page

Do NOT implement anything outside the requested MVP scope.
Return changed files and validation results.
handoff.verification_prompt: Verify this implementation against the acceptance criteria.\nReturn pass/fail per criterion and concrete evidence.
handoff.qa_test_prompt: Validate implementation against acceptance criteria.\nReport pass/fail per criterion and list any missing requirements.
